channel.title: Care to explain anyone?
channel.description:
I get hit so hard at frost dragons and I don't know why!
Gear [img]http://gyazo.com/6573513476ece9bbfc20d9833faa4469.png[/img]
Inventory Setup + Tortoise (Forgot to add that) [img]http://gyazo.com/42837e7b653daae658f8b8d4c53fb51e.png[/img]

item.title: Care to explain anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Not to mention, Bandos Defence is Shit. And you have super-antifire so you don’t need the sheild. Use The Off-Hand Rapier for faster kills and less dmg taken.

Read full topic

item.title: Care to explain anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

rip4d:

If theres a blue orb, 100% of your damage gets reflected, which is probably why you’re getting funked up.

Read full topic

item.title: Care to explain anyone?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

If theres a blue orb, 100% of your damage gets reflected, which is probably why you’re getting funked up.

Read full topic

item.title: Care to explain anyone?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:5, topic:536790”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=655606.msg4388849#msg4388849 date=1386717488]

If you’re going to use Chaotics, either use dual longswords or rapiers, or maul. Take an antifire instead of using a Dragonfire shield. Antifire only protects 50% of fire breath, but you should be fine, unless you can use Super antifires. Then it will protect 100%. If you can use Soul split, use that as well. I usually just use Elite melee void and I do fine. My inventory is 1 Prayer potion (4), 1 Antifire (2), 1 Prayer renewal (2), and 5 sharks just in case I fudge up with the orb. Also, the Warpriest gloves are better than Barrows gloves.

Never heard of Warpriest Gloves tho. Ill look them up…

It was one of the armour rewords from the first world event between Zamorak and Saradomin. You can now get them as a drop from either Saradomin or Zamorak main bosses in the boss room, or spiritual mages.
[/quote]

Only Chaotic I have is Rapier, I can’t afford Drygores so idk what to use.[/quote]

You could spend a few hours getting the off-hand, which is only 100k tokens. And you will kill them a lot faster.

This page might also help you a bit:
http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Frost_dragon/Strategies

Read full topic

item.title: Care to explain anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:4, topic:536790”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=655606.msg4388848#msg4388848 date=1386717437]

If you’re going to use Chaotics, either use dual longswords or rapiers, or maul. Take an antifire instead of using a Dragonfire shield. Antifire only protects 50% of fire breath, but you should be fine, unless you can use Super antifires. Then it will protect 100%. If you can use Soul split, use that as well. I usually just use Elite melee void and I do fine. My inventory is 1 Prayer potion (4), 1 Antifire (2), 1 Prayer renewal (2), and 5 sharks just in case I fudge up with the orb. Also, the Warpriest gloves are better than Barrows gloves.

Never heard of Warpriest Gloves tho. Ill look them up…
[/quote]

It was one of the armour rewords from the first world event between Zamorak and Saradomin. You can now get them as a drop from either Saradomin or Zamorak main bosses in the boss room, or spiritual mages.[/quote]

Only Chaotic I have is Rapier, I can’t afford Drygores so idk what to use.

item.title: Care to explain anyone?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:3, topic:536790”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=655606.msg4388847#msg4388847 date=1386717218]
If you’re going to use Chaotics, either use dual longswords or rapiers, or maul. Take an antifire instead of using a Dragonfire shield. Antifire only protects 50% of fire breath, but you should be fine, unless you can use Super antifires. Then it will protect 100%. If you can use Soul split, use that as well. I usually just use Elite melee void and I do fine. My inventory is 1 Prayer potion (4), 1 Antifire (2), 1 Prayer renewal (2), and 5 sharks just in case I fudge up with the orb. Also, the Warpriest gloves are better than Barrows gloves.
[/quote]

Never heard of Warpriest Gloves tho. Ill look them up…[/quote]

It was one of the armour rewords from the first world event between Zamorak and Saradomin. You can now get them as a drop from either Saradomin or Zamorak main bosses in the boss room, or spiritual mages.

Read full topic
